charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] went for a stroll
around town.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1101_0200:
In front of a certain café, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across a
woman who looked like Diantha.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1101_0300:
Although...she did appear to be keeping a
low profile.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_0400:
What a lovely looking café! I think I’ll try this
one today!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0402_0900: Oh, I think I know that voice!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_1000:
I knew it! So it was you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Looks like you noticed
me right away!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_1100:
If you have some time, would you like to join me
for a cup of tea?
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_1300: I-I’m a huge fan! Could I shake your hand?
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_1500:
At this rate, we might cause some trouble for the
owners of this café.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_1600: *chuckle* In that case...catch me if you can!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1101_1800:
Smiling, Diantha took [Name:PlayerNickname ]
by the hand, and they left the area together.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_2000:
Oh my gosh! Isn’t that the famous movie 
star Diantha?!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_2100:
Hey, did you hear? You can get Diantha’s
autograph if you catch up to her!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1101_2200:
A long line of fans eager to greet Diantha formed
in no time at all.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1101_2300:
But Diantha greeted each and every one of them
with a smile and a handshake.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0402_2800: I suppose. But it’s a good kind of tired.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_2900:
Thanks for your concern, Gardevoir. But really,
I’m OK.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_3000:
Being able to meet my fans in person is a
wonderful thing.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_3100:
You know, Gardevoir is always by my side,
watching out for me.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_3200:
I enjoy meeting my fans, so it’s not a burden for
me at all!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_3300: But I suppose Gardevoir can’t help but worry.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0301_3400: She wants you to rely on her!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0401_3600:
I think you might be right. Maybe I was trying too
hard all by myself.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0302_3700: What a kind partner you have!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0402_3800: Isn’t she? She’s my pride and joy!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_0402_3900:
But I suppose I have much to learn if I’m still
making my precious partner worry about me.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4000:
I truly love my fans, so I figured I would do 
anything to make them happy.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4100:
But I guess sometimes it’s hard to tell what your
limits are just by yourself.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4200:
Sorry for worrying you, Gardevoir. Let’s get a
good night’s sleep tonight!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4300:
I’m happy to have so many fans that support my
work as an actress.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4400:
And I’m blessed with a partner Pokémon that
cares about me so much.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4500:
Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You helped me remember something important.
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4600:
My heart is overflowing with energy from all of 
these kind and wonderful feelings!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4700:
Once I rest up again, I’ll be sure to turn that
energy into something I can share with everyone!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4800:
And for the people I can’t meet in person, I’ll do
my best to send those feelings through the
movie screen!
charaepi_ch0158_00_carnet/2301_1201_4900: That’s where I shine the brightest, after all!
